lead_paragraph: A natural gas well blowout last year that crippled a major energy supply for Southern California could lead to blackouts over 14 days this summer, state officials said Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: California: Blackouts Possible After Leak Hobbles Gas Facility
headline.main: California: Blackouts Possible After Leak Hobbles Gas Facility

snippet: A natural gas well blowout last year that crippled a major energy supply for Southern California could lead to blackouts over 14 days this summer, state officials said Tuesday.
abstract: California state officials investigate cause of 2015 natural gas well blowout at Southern California Gas Company facility that could lead to blackouts for over two weeks this summer in South California; facility has not been fully operational since months-long leak.
